_header: Listeneth awhile and think ye not long
Subjects: sermons; scripture texts, Engl. trans. of; psalms, penitential

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
Lystenythe a while and thenke ye nott longeTurne to that lorde as
                    the prophete can saye…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…And to that blysse he shall vs bendeIn heuene that neuyre
                    shall haue ende
BLAdd60577.Note:
Preceded by beginning of psalm, ‘Quis ascendit in montem domini
                        ant quis in loco sancto eius / Innocens manibus et mundo
                    corde’.
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
